info.author: UNKNOWN
info.description:
Introduction
============

A basic and light-weight workspace manager for PMR.  While this package
will ultimately be usable as a general purpose library, for now features
are targetted for integration by the MAP client.

Changelog
=========

0.2 - 2014-07-14
----------------

- Renaming to the standard top-level namespace for this group of
  packages.

0.1 - 2013-12-18
----------------

- Initial release.
- Core support for basic incremental workflow management using both git
  and mercurial.
info.name: pmr2.wfctrl
info.html_description:
Introduction

A basic and light-weight workspace manager for PMR. While this package will ultimately be usable as a general purpose library, for now features are targetted for integration by the MAP client.

Changelog

0.2 - 2014-07-14

  • Renaming to the standard top-level namespace for this group of packages.

0.1 - 2013-12-18

  • Initial release.
  • Core support for basic incremental workflow management using both git and mercurial.
